comments:
This defect fails testcase Correlation1_W2K - AssociationEngine testsuite
driver TPTP-4.0-200503301557

I import an access log file, create a Time based correlation then select the 
correlation and right click to open the Log Interactions
Nothing happens, the menu doesn't appear; I see this in the log file :

*** Bug 89776 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
